entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
